step.context: \text{If a vector $\ora{v}$ makes an angle $\theta_x$ with the x-axis,} \\ \text{what the component of $\ora{v}$ along the x-axis?}
step.tex: \text{Cannot be determined since the $\theta$ is an angle in} \\ \text{3-d space.}
step.reason: \text{The component of a vector along a direction} \\ \text{is given by $\cos$ of the angle it makes with} \\ \text{that direction. Therefore, if $\ora{v}$ is a vector} \\ \text{in 3-d space, and its angle with the x, y and z} \\ \text{axes are $\theta_x$, $\theta_y$ and $\theta_z$ respectively then,} \\ \begin{tabular}{|c|c|} \hline \text{Component along} & \text{Value} \\ \hline \text{x-axis} & \vert\ora{v}\vert\cos\theta_x \\ \text{y-axis} & \vert\ora{v}\vert\cos\theta_y \\ \text{z-axis} & \vert\ora{v}\vert\cos\theta_z \\ \hline \end{tabular}
